column1: # Description: New source performance standards (NSPS) and retrofits (which can be for future and/or base-year plants) for China industrial coal consumption developed by K. Mulvaney and described in Sampedro et al. (2020) https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envint.2020.105513.

column14: Current regulations in China as documented in Sampedro et al. (2020). doi 10.1016/j.envint.2020.105513. Assume conservative 10-year retrofit time (longer than initially planned)
